Text: DISCOUNT ON FINANCIAL REPORTING CONFERENCEEvening MBA Students From Nils Hakansson Program Chair The Center for Financial Reporting and Management in the Haas School is hosting its Tenth Annual Conference on Financial Reporting at the San Francisco Marriott Hotel on Friday November As a special offer to Evening MBA Program students we are offering a seat to each student at the discounted price of per seat This can be used by you or by a person in your firm whom you wish to designate A copy of the program is attached If you or an associate wish to attend please send an email to Dayna Haugh at and request a brochure with registration form She will leave a brochure in your box Please fill out the registration form endorse it with EVENING PROGRAM and return it with the fee to the Center for Financial Reporting and Management in the School The CFRM office is located in room D Faculty building or you can leave it in Dayna Haughs mailbox in the student services building mailroom If you have questions you can contact Dayna Haugh at Tenth Conference Program Dayna Haugh Center Manager Center for Financial Reporting and Management Haas School of Business University of California D Faculty Building Berkeley CA Phone Fax accounting

An Invitation to Attend Financial Reporting ConferenceDear Evening MBA Students The Center for Financial Reporting and Management in the Haas School is hosting it Twelfth Annual Conference on Financial Reporting on Monday November at the San Francisco Marriott Hotel Fourth Street As a special offer to Evening MBA Program students we are offering one seat to each student at the discounted price of per seat This can be used by you or by a person in your firm whom you wish to designate A copy of the program is attached If you or an associate wish to attend please register online at accountingcfrmregistrationhtm When filling out the registration form please write EVENING PROGRAM in the additional registrants space on the form I will contact you regarding payment If you prefer to pay by check you may print the registration form and mail it or leave it in Dayna Haughs mailbox in the student services building mailroom with a check If you have questions feel free to contact me at We hope you or one of your colleagues will be able to attend Dayna Haugh Assistant Director Center for Financial Reporting and Management Haas School of Business University of California D Faculty Building Berkeley CA Phone Fax accountingcfrmcfrmhtmwwwhaasberkeleyeduaccountingcfrmcfrm accountingcfrmcfrmhtm
